name: Through The Forest (FEEDBACK TEST)
description:
THIS IS A FEEDBACK TEST

THE GAME IN NOT FINISH

Watch THIS VIDEO FIRST

=)

Hi all. I will share the last video of my series where I create a video game with Free Assets in 39 hours and show the entire creation process.

In this video I make a final sample of how the product is looking before asking the testers for feedback.

then, after collecting all the critics of the game, I'm going to record some more videos where I plan to fix all the inconsistencies and the different things that people who try the game and deserve the video will point out to me.

Any suggestions please leave them in the comments below or in the youtube video.

I hope to publish the game by the end of February.

The game will be free and it will be possible to play from several game pages from the internet.

I thank everyone who supported me during the development of this game.

Regards

Game Design & Programming By jameschappfillmore
